The claim is based on a WhatsApp message: minute voice note, both of which suggest that the Ghanaian President Nana Akufo-Addo read Rockefeller's secret document on COVID-19.
American author Dr: Christiane Northrup shared the same claim on her public Facebook page, providing a YouTube link to the voice recording.
Ghana: s Information Minister Kojo Oppong Nkrumah confirmed that the audio recording was not made by the president and dismissed the claim as false.
